name: ShowServerLocation2_1
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(ACE-T Node in Desk Preference,Hardware Design Selection_ACE_T_Node,Node_Supplier_ACE_T,Trusted Platform Module_TPM_ACE_T,Additional Hard Disk (ACE-T),Displays (ACE-T)(0-1),Display Size (ACE-T),Display Supplier (ACE-T),ServerLocationClusNetwork_Group desk)*>
[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(Interface with TPS Required?)*>,Yes)){<*SETOPTIONAL(Additional Memory (ACE-T))*><*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory (ACE-T))*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory (ACE-T))*><*SETREQUIRED(Additional Memory (ACE-T))*>}[ENDIF]
<*xDisallowallValuesExcept(ServerLocationClusNetwork_Group desk:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM 
ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) 
<= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
